articles.title: Stocks rise on US debt ceiling deal but China drags - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares and Wall Street futures rose on Monday as a weekend deal by U.S. President Joe Biden and House Speaker Kevin McCarthy to suspend the government's debt ceiling provided relief for investors although China worries capped sentiment.
articles.content: SYDNEY, May 29 (Reuters) - Asian shares and Wall Street futures rose on Monday as a weekend deal by U.S. President Joe Biden and House Speaker Kevin McCarthy to suspend the government's debt ceiling … [+4122 chars]

articles.author: Yoonjung Seo
articles.title: Asiana Airlines to stop selling seats near emergency exit on Airbus A321s - CNN
articles.description: Asiana Airlines will no longer sell tickets for certain emergency exit seats of its Airbus A321-200 aircraft, the airline said Sunday, following a recent incident in which a man allegedly opened a jetliner door during a flight.

articles.title: Asia markets set to mostly rise after U.S. reached tentative debt ceiling deal over weekend - CNBC
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden and congressional leaders reached a tentative deal on raising the debt ceiling.
